ack.p: The authors would like to acknowledge the University of Münster, the Bundesministerium für Bildung und Forschung (BMBF) within the project “IES, Innovative Elektrochemische Superkondensatoren” (contract number 03EK3010), and the European Commission within the “ORION” project (229036) under the Seventh Framework Programme (7 th FWP) for the financial support.
